title: [GSoC Snippet] 27/08/2014
author: Maciej (Developer Website)
content:
[configuration] supybot configuration to add RSS feed to our IRC: Today I was fighting (for few hours) with Supybot configuration. Actually, thanks to supybot-wizard, configuration is really easy, but in documentation there are no examples of correct configuration and some custom options are really hard to be set. So I still don't have working configuration, but I think I am will do that tomorrow.
Originally posted on pino IT / ruby / developer
